title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XLIX, pt. 4100 - Public Access To Records
content:

State Regulations
§ 4100.1 - Location of office of commission
§ 4100.2 - Hours for public inspection of records; records access officer
§ 4100.3 - Time and place of meetings of commission

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XLIX, pt. 4100

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, art. 7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
